item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会发现主要药房福利管理公司哄抬药价，从中获利 73 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二表示，美国三大药房福利管理公司在其下属药房大幅提高了某些药品的价格，包括治疗心脏病、癌症和艾滋病的药品。【原文：The nation's three largest pharmacy benefit managers have significantly marked up the prices of certain medicines, including for heart disease, cancer and HIV, at their affiliated pharmacies, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Tuesday.】

item.title: LVMH集团称 "不可能 "控制香槟运往俄罗斯后的最终销售点
item.description: LVMH 集团周二表示，"不可能 "控制第三方分销商销售的产品的最终目的地，因为有报道称，该法国奢侈品集团的香槟在停止俄罗斯业务后仍被运到了那里。【原文：LVMH said on Tuesday it was "impossible" to control the final destination of products sold by third-party distributors after a report said the French luxury group's champagne reached Russia even after it halted business there.】

item.title: 波音公司高管认为十年末将实现供需平衡
item.description: 波音公司一位高管周一表示，预计到本世纪末，客机的供应和市场需求将达到平衡。【原文：Boeing expects to reach a balance between supply and market demand for passenger jets by the end of the decade, an executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯北极石油感受到美国制裁的寒意
item.description: 据三位熟悉俄罗斯北极地区石油物流的消息人士称，俄罗斯庞大的北极地区石油业务正面临着美国对其油轮和油库实施制裁所带来的重大干扰，此前被亚洲买家抢购的原油供应被滞留在仓库中。【原文：Russia's vast Arctic oil business is facing major disruption from U.S. sanctions on its tankers and depots, stranding crude supplies previously snapped up by Asian buyers in storage, according to three sources familiar with its logistics.】

item.title: 债券抛售减弱，欧美股市上涨，通胀成为关注焦点
item.description: 尽管在周三的美国消费者价格通胀数据和唐纳德-特朗普下周的总统就职典礼之前，投资者仍持谨慎态度，但由于债券抛售有所缓和，美国和欧洲股市周二走高。【原文：U.S. and European stocks ticked higher on Tuesday as a sell-off in bonds moderated, although investors remained cautious ahead of U.S. consumer price inflation data on Wednesday and Donald Trump's inauguration as president next week.】

item.title: 佳洁士和高露洁针对儿童牙膏和漱口水中的氟提起诉讼
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）和高露洁-棕榄公司（Colgate-Palmolive）是六起新诉讼案的被告之一，这些诉讼案针对的是幼儿牙膏和漱口水的销售，因为这些产品含有氟化物，吞咽后可能有害。【原文：Procter & Gamble and Colgate-Palmolive are among the defendants in six new lawsuits targeting the sale of toothpaste and mouth rinse for young children because the products contain fluoride, which can be harmful if swallowed.】

item.title: 礼来预计第四季度减肥药销售疲软
item.description: 礼来公司预计，第四季度流行的减肥药Zepbound和相关糖尿病治疗药物Mounjaro的销售额将低于华尔街预期，但预计2025年的收入将基本高于预期。【原文：Eli Lilly expects sales of popular weight-loss drug Zepbound and related diabetes treatment Mounjaro to miss Wall Street expectations in the fourth quarter, but forecast 2025 revenue largely above estimates.】

item.title: 中国将参与台湾军售的七家美国公司列入黑名单
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，它已将七家美国公司列入所谓的 "不可靠实体名单"，因为这些公司参与了对台军售，而中国视台湾为其领土的一部分。【原文：The Chinese commerce ministry said on Tuesday that it had added seven U.S. companies to its so-called "Unreliable Entity List" for their involvement in arms sales to Taiwan, which China regards as part of its territory.】

item.title: 美国因维吾尔族强迫劳动禁止更多公司进口产品
item.description: 美国联邦政府周二发布公告称，因涉嫌侵犯中国维吾尔族人权，美国已禁止进口另一批公司的产品，目标是30多家纺织、采矿和太阳能企业。【原文：The United States has banned imports from another tranche of companies over alleged human rights abuses involving the Uyghurs in China, targeting more than 30 textile, mining and solar entities, a federal government notice published on Tuesday said.】

item.title: 美国 12 月生产者价格温和上涨
item.description: 美国生产者价格在 12 月份温和上涨，但这不太可能改变人们的看法，即在劳动力市场保持韧性的情况下，美联储不会在今年下半年之前再次降息。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased moderately in December, but that is unlikely to change views that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates again before the second half of this year amid labor market resilience.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命首席执行官竞争者詹妮弗-皮普扎克（Jennifer Piepszak）为运营总监
item.description: 摩根大通周二晋升内部人士詹妮弗-皮普扎克（Jennifer Piepszak）为首席运营官，接替将于 2026 年底退休的丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto），后者被视为首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）职位的有力竞争者。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday promoted insider Jennifer Piepszak, seen as a strong contender for CEO Jamie Dimon's role, as its chief operating officer in place of Daniel Pinto, who will retire at the end of 2026.】

item.title: 世界杯临近，美国银行与美国足协合作
item.description: 美国银行将成为美国所有 27 支国家足球队的官方银行合作伙伴，此前这家华尔街巨头和美国足协于本周二宣布了他们的合作关系。【原文：Bank of America is set to become the official banking partner of all 27 national soccer teams in the United States, after the Wall Street behemoth and the U.S. Soccer Federation announced their partnership on Tuesday.】

item.title: 碧桂园 2023 财年和 2024 财年上半年业绩出现亏损
item.description: 碧桂园曾是中国销售额最高的房地产开发商，本周二公布的 2024 年上半年业绩净亏损为 128.4 亿元（17.5 亿美元），原因是整个行业长期低迷，经营状况恶化。【原文：Country Garden , once China's top property developer by sales, posted on Tuesday a net loss of 12.84 billion yuan ($1.75 billion) for the first half of 2024, as conditions deteriorated amid a prolonged sector-wide slump.】

item.title: 布朗-福尔曼宣布重组，全球裁员约 12
item.description: 杰克丹尼尔酒制造商布朗-福尔曼（Brown-Forman）周二表示，公司将裁减约 12% 的全球员工，即 5400 名员工，因为公司希望在酒类需求疲软的情况下削减成本。【原文：Jack Daniel's maker Brown-Forman said on Tuesday it would cut about 12% of its global workforce, or 5,400 employees, as the company looks to cut costs amid weak alcohol demand.】

item.title: Capital One 因逃避数十亿利息支付被美国监管机构起诉
item.description: Capital One 周二遭到美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）的起诉，该局指控该银行非法逃避向持有其旗舰产品 "高息 "储蓄账户的消费者支付 20 多亿美元的利息。【原文：Capital One was sued on Tuesday by the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, which accused the bank of illegally avoiding the payment of more than $2 billion in interest to consumers who held its flagship "high interest" savings account.】

item.title: 荷美尔食品公司长期首席执行官詹姆斯-斯尼将退休
item.description: 荷美尔食品公司（Hormel Foods）周二表示，公司首席执行官詹姆斯-斯尼（James Snee）在领导公司近九年后，将于 2025 年底退休。【原文：Hormel Foods said on Tuesday its CEO, James Snee, is set to retire at the end of 2025, after leading the company for nearly nine years.】

item.title: 拜登将发布行政命令确保人工智能数据中心的电力供应
item.description: 白宫表示，乔-拜登总统将于周二发布一项行政命令，为解决快速增长的先进人工智能数据中心的巨大能源需求提供联邦支持。【原文：President Joe Biden will issue an executive order on Tuesday to provide federal support to address massive energy needs for fast-growing advanced artificial intelligence data centers, the White House said.】

item.title: 联合租赁公司将收购 H&E 设备服务公司，交易价值 48 亿美元
item.description: 联合租赁公司（United Rentals）周二表示，将收购规模较小的竞争对手 H&E Equipment Services，交易价值 48 亿美元，该公司希望借此开发设备租赁需求。【原文：United Rentals said on Tuesday it would acquire smaller rival H&E Equipment Services in a deal valued at $4.8 billion, as the company looks to tap into demand for equipment rentals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯对谷歌罚款 780 万美元，原因是谷歌无视之前的处罚
item.description: 莫斯科法院新闻处在 Telegram 上称，俄罗斯法院周二对 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司处以 80 亿卢布（约合 7790 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司未遵守之前的处罚令。【原文：A Russian court fined Alphabet's Google 8 billion roubles ($77.9 million) on Tuesday for not complying with previous penalty orders, the Moscow courts press service said on Telegram.】

item.title: 欧盟称正在评估科技案件，不受美国新政府影响
item.description: 欧盟发言人周二表示，无论美国新政府如何，欧盟委员会仍将致力于执行其针对大型社交媒体平台的规则。【原文：The European Commission remains committed to enforcing its rules for large social media platforms regardless of the new U.S. administration, an EU spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，麦格理将向 Applied Digital 数据中心投资 50 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，投资银行麦格理（Macquarie）将向应用数字公司（Applied Digital）的人工智能数据中心投资高达 50 亿美元，并将持有该公司 15%的股份。【原文：Investment bank Macquarie will invest up to $5 billion in Applied Digital's AI data centers and will take a 15% stake in the company, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: Wabtec 将以 17.8 亿美元收购 Evident 的检测技术部门
item.description: 重工业零部件制造商 Wabtec 公司周二表示，已同意以 17.8 亿美元的价格收购 Evident 的检测技术部门。【原文：Heavy industrial parts maker Wabtec Corp said on Tuesday it has agreed to buy Evident's inspection technologies division for $1.78 billion.】

item.title: 秘鲁的利基布雷塔尼亚原油在美国大受欢迎
item.description: 秘鲁的利基布雷塔纳原油在美国越来越受欢迎，随着美国炼油商寻求替代日益减少的墨西哥重质原油，本月第一批货物将在美国墨西哥湾沿岸卸货。【原文：Peru's niche Bretaña crude oil is gaining popularity in the United States, with the first cargo discharging in the U.S. Gulf Coast this month as U.S. refiners seek alternatives for declining Mexican heavy crude.】

item.title: 投资者关注通胀数据和季度收益，期货价格攀升
item.description: 周二，在国债收益率下降的支撑下，美国股指期货上涨，投资者在等待12月份的通胀数据以及即将公布的企业财报，以评估全球最大经济体的健康状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday, supported by falling Treasury yields as investors awaited December's inflation numbers as well as upcoming corporate earnings to assess the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场在通胀和盈利前稍事休息
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国小型企业信心跃升至六年多来新高
item.description: 12 月份，美国小企业信心指数飙升至六年多来的最高水平，延续了大选后的涨势。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence surged to the highest level in just over six years in December, extending post election gains.】

item.title: 洛杉矶资金管理公司努力应对野火对业务和员工的影响
item.description: 总部位于洛杉矶的资产管理公司正在努力应对该地区毁灭性野火对其业务造成的影响，一些公司搬迁了办公场所，并为失去家园的员工提供支持。【原文：Los Angeles-based asset management firms are grappling with the impact of the region's destructive wildfires on their operations, with some relocating office space and supporting staff members who have lost their homes.】

item.title: 英国反垄断监管机构将调查谷歌搜索服务
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构周二表示，将利用新的权力调查谷歌的搜索服务，以了解这些服务对消费者和企业（包括广告商、新闻出版商和竞争对手的搜索引擎）的影响。【原文：Britain's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday it would investigate Google's search services using its new powers to see how they impact consumers and businesses, including advertisers, news publishers and rival search engines.】

item.title: 大众汽车今年在国内和中国的销量均出现下滑
item.description: 德国大众汽车公司周二发布报告称，2024 年该公司的汽车销量下降了 2.3%，仅略高于 900 万辆，因为该公司正努力在国内削减成本，并在其最大的市场中国打价格战。【原文：Volkswagen's sales fell 2.3% in 2024 to just over nine million vehicles, the German automaker reported on Tuesday, as it struggles to cut costs at home and fight a price war in China, its biggest market.】

item.title: 拜登政府敲定美国对中国汽车的打压措施
item.description: 乔-拜登总统即将卸任的政府将于周二敲定相关规定，作为打击来自中国的汽车软件和硬件的一部分，这些规定将有效禁止几乎所有中国汽车和卡车进入美国市场。【原文：President Joe Biden's outgoing administration is finalizing rules on Tuesday that will effectively bar nearly all Chinese cars and trucks from the U.S. market, as part of a crackdown on vehicle software and hardware from China.】
